text:
(1) Richmond Terrace, at the N.W. corner of Hyatt Street. Shown is the rear of the Richmond Borough Hall, facing on Stuyvesant Street. The building was erected in 1905.

About 1905

By Mulford Simonson
From the Staten Island Museum Collection through P. L. Sperr

(2) Another view of the rear of the Borough Hall, years later.

March 5, 1930

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Hyatt Street
